titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid to the Department of East Asian Studies Record CA.MS.00129
titlestmt.author: Elisha Winkler

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-11-15 14:50:42 -0500.

change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)
Containers added and finding aid updated as part of College Archives survey

did.unittitle: Department of East Asian Studies Records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Smith College. Dept. of East Asian Studies.

did.abstract: This collection contains black and white photographs, newspaper articles, mid-year and final exams, and department announcements.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The East Asian studies major began in the 1988-1989 academic year at Smith College.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Department of East Asian Studies records contain materials describing the history of the department. Types of materials include black and white photos of professors and student club members, newspaper articles, department announcements, faculty and course outline, and mid-year and final exam questions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of East Asian Studies Records, Smith College Archives, CA-MS-00129, Smith College Special Collections, Northampton, Massachusetts.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Researchers should also view: RG 42. Faculty

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Smith College retains copyright of materials created as part of its business operations; however, copyright in other items in this collection may be held by their respective creators. For reproductions of materials that are governed by fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. For instances which may regard materials in the collection not created by Smith College, researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights and obtaining approval from them. Researchers do not need anything further from Smith College Special Collections to move forward with their use.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The East Asian Studies Department records were created by the department and tranferred to the College Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for use without restriction beyond the standard terms and conditions of Smith College Special Collections.

controlaccess.corpname: Smith College. Dept. of East Asian Studies.
